sentences.cn: 文学士；工程学士；理学士
文学士/理学士/教育学士等

sentences.en: Gerald was 38, and a confirmed bachelor (=  a man who has decided that he will never marry  ) .
sentences.cn: 杰拉德38岁，抱定主意独身。

sentences.en: He became a Bachelor of Arts at the age of twenty.
sentences.cn: 他二十岁时成了文学士.

sentences.en: He is a bachelor , living in a bare appartment in the state capital.
sentences.cn: 他是个未婚的独身汉, 住在加州首府一套简朴的单元房子里.

sentences.en: He is still living a bachelor's life.
He received a Bachelor's drgee of Pediatrics.
sentences.cn: 他获得了小儿科学士学位。

sentences.en: He remained a bachelor all his life.

sentences.cn: 他抱定主意一辈子独身.

sentences.en: His uncle said he'd never get married; he's a confirmed bachelor.
sentences.cn: 他叔叔说他永远不会结婚, 因为他过惯了单身生活.

sentences.en: It wouldn't have occurred to me to get myself a bachelor pad.
sentences.cn: 否则我不会想到给自己找一套单身公寓。

sentences.en: Mr Utterson came home to his bachelor house in sombre spirits.
sentences.cn: 厄塔森先生回到他那单身汉的家里,心情烦躁.

sentences.en: The Crown Prince was Japan’s most eligible bachelor (=  a rich young man who has not yet married  ) .
sentences.cn: 皇太子是日本最理想的适婚男子。

sentences.en: The flat contained the basic essentials for bachelor life.
sentences.cn: 那套公寓配有单身生活的基本必需品。

sentences.en: The frown on the bachelor's face was deepening to a scowl.
sentences.cn: 独身男人的眉头皱得更紧了.

sentences.en: The instant Simonetta had set eyes on Ivo, his bachelor days were numbered.
sentences.cn: 当西蒙内塔看到伊沃的那一瞬间, 他独身生活的日子就屈指可数了.

sentences.en: To do the job, you must have at least a bachelor degree in chemistry.
sentences.cn: 要做这项工作至少也要先取得化学学士学位.

sentences.en: You have the alternative of marrying or remaining a bachelor.
sentences.cn: 你可以结婚也可以仍做单身汉,任你选择.

words.tran_cn: 学士学位；对毕业班的致辞

phrases.tran_cn: 学士学位；大学本科学位证书
（美）单身汉舞会（尤指婚礼前夕为新郎举行的）

trans.tran_en: a man who has never been married
